name: Mobile telegrams are sent every 60 seconds ±10%

statusDetails.trace:
@allure.feature("Mobile Telegram Timing")
    @allure.title("Mobile telegrams are sent every 60 seconds ±10%")
    def test_timing():
        telegrams = record_telegrams(duration_minutes=10000)
    
        timings = [
            datetime.strptime(
                telegram.split(" at ")[1].split(" Volume: ")[0], "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"
            )
            for telegram in telegrams
            if telegram.startswith("Mobile")
        ]
    
        errors = []
        for i in range(1, len(timings)):
            diff_seconds = (timings[i] - timings[i - 1]).total_seconds()
            if not (54 <= diff_seconds <= 66):
                errors.append(f"{timings[i]}: interval = {diff_seconds:.2f}s")
    
>       assert not errors, "Timing errors found:\n" + "\n".join(errors)
